description:
Watsuji Aya is a mysterious girl with long black hair. The course of events has made her an insecure, withdrawn girl who is hard to get through to.
When her http://anidb.net/ch39751 [mother] died in a car accident strange things began to happen in her life: The next day her mother was alive again - but then people around Aya began to vanish one by one. Despite now living all alone in an empty town she tries to live on as if nothing happened, attends school, and practices archery, hoping that somehow her world will return to normalcy, and trying to prevent going insane. http://anidb.net/ch9745 [The unnamed protagonist] who happens to see her on a station platform is the first person whom she meets after a long time.
name: Watsuji Aya
